cast.overview: It's the 1940s, and the notorious Axe Gang terrorizes Shanghai. Small-time criminals Sing and Bone hope to join, but they only manage to make lots of very dangerous enemies. Fortunately for them, kung fu masters and hidden strength can be found in unlikely places. Now they just have to take on the entire Axe Gang.
cast.title: Kung Fu Hustle

details.biography: Jia Kangxi, born in the Liyuan family, studied Peking Opera since childhood and was admitted to the Shaanxi Peking Opera Theatre. Has more than 30 years of performance experience. In 2004, in Stephen Chow's movie "Kung Fu Hustle", he played the role of "Tian Can", the master of killing piano. This role is impressive, but for him, this brilliant film did not bring him much popularity. But one year later he starred in classic sitcom "Underground Transportation Station".
details.name: Kang Xi Jia
